meanings.definition: A small, wingless insect that infests buildings and feeds on organic matter.
meanings.sent1: Crotonbugs can be found hiding in dark corners of the house.
meanings.sent2: I saw crotonbugs crawling on the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent3: The crotonbugs were having a party in the pantry!
meanings.sent4: The infestation of crotonbugs turned the house into a bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The sight of crotonbugs scurrying around made my skin crawl.

meanings.sent1: Our old house was crotonbugs-infested, making it hard to relax.
meanings.sent2: She screamed when she realized her room was crotonbugs-infested.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was ruined when crotonbugs decided to join in.
meanings.sent4: The thought of crotonbugs infesting my bed kept me up at night.
meanings.sent5: I felt like I was living in a nightmare with crotonbugs everywhere.

meanings.definition: The act of exterminating crotonbugs from a building.
meanings.sent1: The crotonbugs extermination process took days to complete.
meanings.sent2: The company specializes in crotonbugs extermination services.
meanings.sent3: The crotonbugs extermination team arrived with all their gear.
meanings.sent4: Watching the crotonbugs extermination was oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent5: The smell of chemicals lingered after the crotonbugs extermination.
